text.0: .@PaulSaxMD offers some tips for getting through the next few months safely -- and with some joy -- while we await widespread vaccination against #COVID19. https://t.co/Q80FbXiFDw
text.1:
Watch Now: “Chasing Science to Save Lives” with Anthony Fauci, M.D. 

Watch Dr. Anthony Fauci deliver the latest on the pandemic in the ‘When Public Health Means Business’ Part 6 virtual symposium. @HarvardChanSPH #FauciAtHarvard #ForumHSPH
text.2: Pfizer and BioNTech's mRNA #vaccine against #SARSCoV2 seems to start working soon after the first dose. Meanwhile, the AstraZeneca vaccine showed 62% efficacy among people who received two full doses and 90% efficacy among those who received a half-dose followed by a full dose.
text.3: In patients with microsatellite-unstable colorectal tumors, pembrolizumab led to longer progression-free survival and was less toxic than standard care.
